thread.title: 7 images summing up the dark mood of Jose Mourinho during Manchester United 0-0 Hull
thread.title_full: 7 images summing up the dark mood of Jose Mourinho during Manchester United 0-0 Hull

author: Mark Jones
title: 7 images summing up the dark mood of Jose Mourinho during Manchester United 0-0 Hull
text:
Jose hits the bottle at Old Trafford (Photo: Julian Finney) Share Get Chelsea FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Wednesday night was not a good one for Jose Mourinho . 
During a midweek when four of the five teams above them all dropped points, Manchester United missed a glorious chance to further their chances of a top four finish when they could only draw 0-0 at home to Hull City . 
On a hugely frustrating evening for the hosts, Marco Silva saw his goalkeeper Eldin Jakupovic deny the hosts on several occasions, and Hull even almost won it late on when Liverpool loanee Lazar Markovic hit the post. Eldin Jakupovic frustrated Marcus Rashford and his United team-mates (Photo: GETTY) 
It all left Mourinho cutting a forlorn figure on the sideline, as his mood increasingly darkened. 
Here's what he was thinking. Kind of. "The dark hair, nice coat, Portuguese charm. I invented all of that son, and this is how you repay me?" The Portuguese men of war (Photo: Matthew Peters) "I knew I should have picked Fellaini" "What? What is this?" (Photo: Getty) "No pictures please" "Man City have scored how many?" A grim Jose (Photo: Clive Mason) "Put this in your own goal for me please mate" Wrong team, Jose (Photo: Matthew Peters) "Right then, what shall I blame for this one? The wind?" Hmmm (Photo: Julian Finney) "This better not just be water" Jose hits the bottle (Photo: Julian Finney) Like us on Facebook
